plugin.title: Plugin Description
plugin.desc1: This plugin only assists in calculating order prices and simulates manual operations to fill in order information and click the place order button on the web page. It does not record or transmit any sensitive data.
plugin.desc2: The plugin is completely open source and free, for learning and communication purposes only. Users should determine whether using the plugin violates Binance Alpha activity rules.

settings.title: Settings
settings.priceOffsetTooltip: The tool automatically refreshes the average price and places orders with the price offset setting. Positive values (+1%) add 1% to the base price, negative values (-1%) subtract 1% from the base price. Sideways mode (buy +0.01%, sell -0.01%) is suitable for stable prices; Bullish mode (buy +0.01%, sell +0.02%) is suitable for rising prices; Custom mode supports flexible configuration from -5% to +5%.
settings.pointsFactorTooltip: KOGE has a 1x points multiplier. If you are trading tokens with 2x or 4x points, please manually adjust this number to ensure the trading volume calculation below is correct.
settings.pointsTargetTooltip: The program will keep running after it starts until it reaches the target points. Common points trading volumes: 14 points -> 16,384; 15 points -> 32,768; 16 points -> 65,536

controls.needAlphaPage: Need to open Binance Alpha token page

stats.statsTooltip: Trading volume and points data are for reference only. They are calculated for every order placed, not just successful orders. If you manually cancel orders, the trading data will be inaccurate. For more accurate trading data, please check the Binance App Alpha activity page.
stats.totalCostTooltip: Total cost is simply initial balance - current balance. If you find the cost is high, it may be because some tokens were not sold correctly. Please check your token balance.
stats.joinTelegram: Join our Telegram community to discuss Alpha farming:
stats.refreshBalanceTooltip: Refresh initial balance with current balance

footer.binanceWallet: Binance Wallet referral code, 10% fee discount
